# protocolMetadata(definition:)

**Instance Method**

Retreives the metadata associated with a specific protocol.

## Declaration

```swift
func protocolMetadata(definition: NWProtocolDefinition) -> NWProtocolMetadata?
```

## Inspecting Receive Contexts

- **isFinal**: A Boolean indicating whether this context represents the final message being sent or received.

items.description: A Boolean indicating whether this context represents the final message being sent or received.
items.name: isFinal
